summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 CHEVROLET CRUZE. WHILE DRIVING AT APPROXIMATELY 45 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING AND LOST ALL ELECTRICAL POWER. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER, WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE CAME IN CONTACT WITH WATER AND FAILED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 108,000.
